TEXT: Tang Monk teacher and apprentice just after ninety-eight one difficult, the path into Buddha, the Jade Emperor great joy, ordered the dream fairy to inform Tang Monk teacher and apprentice as soon as possible, to the East China Sea to defeat the seven demons. After learning this, Tang Monk thanked the Lord Longen, quickly boarded the cloud of the dream fairy, and flew to the East China Sea to complete the task of the Jade Emperor.
